name: .ASPK File Extension
summary: Learn about .ASPK files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An ASPK file is an Android Split Package used with My APK, a third-party Android app manager. It contains a number of .APK files used to install an Android application, as well as metadata describing the application. ASPK files are created and used only by My APK.

content: Similar to .AAB and .APKM files, ASPK files include a number of APK files used to install an Android application on a specific device running a specific version of the Android operating system. Unlike AAB and APKM files, however, ASPK files are simple Zip packages that can be decompressed using any Zip decompression utility.

instructions: ASPK files are primarily used to install Android apps from within My APK. However, if you want to view the contents of an ASPK package, you can decompress the package using any Zip decompression utility.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
